      • camelToUnderlined

        public static java.lang.String camelToUnderlined(java.lang.String camel)
        convert a camel name to a underlined lower case name

        Here are some examples:

        • null => NullPointerException
        • "" => ""
        • "GreatChanges" => "great_changes"
        • "tinyChanges" => "tiny_changes"
        • "SUPER" => "super"
        • "SFItems" => "sf_items"
        • "ILoveMc" => "i_love_mc"
        • "ILoveMC" => "i_love_mc"
        • "__Me__" => "__me__"
        • "__me__" => "__me__"
        • "happy!" => IllegalArgumentException
        • "SF's chair" => IllegalArgumentException
        参数:
        camel - A camel name
        返回:
        A underlined lower case name
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if camel is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if camel is not a valid name

      • rawtype

        public static <T> T rawtype(java.lang.Object o)
        A useful helper for ICapabilityProvider.getCapability(Capability, EnumFacing) and so on to avoid rawtype warning

      • nonnull

        @Nonnull
public static <T> T nonnull()
        A useful helper for GameRegistry.ObjectHolder and so on to avoid null pointer warning

      • nonnull

        @Nonnull
public static <T> T nonnull(@Nullable
                                      T t)
        A useful helper for EnumHelper.addToolMaterial(String, int, int, float, float, int) and so on to avoid null pointer warning
